mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Order_reg (order_reg_id, item_id, user_id, ord_reg_dt, receiver_name, ship_addr1, ship_addr2, ship_zip, card_type, card_num, card_exp_dt, quantity, ord_price) VALUES (ORDER_REG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{item.item_id}, #{user.user_id}, #{ord_reg_dt}, #{receiver_name}, #{ship_addr1}, #{ship_addr2}, #{ship_zip}, #{card_type}, #{card_num}, #{card_exp_dt}, #{quantity}, #{ord_price})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM order_reg WHERE order_reg_id = #{order_reg_id} AND user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_reg_id, o.user_id, o.ord_reg_dt, o.quantity, o.ord_price, o.receiver_name, o.ship_addr1, o.ship_addr2, o.ship_zip, o.card_type, o.card_num, o.card_exp_dt, o.user_id, a.name AS username, a.phone, a.email, i.item_id, i.title, i.item_status, f.food_id, f.name AS foodname, im.image_id, im.image FROM Order_reg o, Item i, Image im, Food f, Account a WHERE o.user_id=#{user_id} and o.order_reg_id = #{order_reg_id} and o.item_id = i.item_id and i.item_id = im.item_id and f.food_id = i.food_id and o.user_id = a.user_id
